__e: I wanted to open a fried chicken restaurant with you.
When you cut the pan fried fish with the knife here... your mouth will water.
I come back here and I eat my chicken fried rice every day.
I just want to enjoy the fried chicken and be done with it.
This sounded better in my head, but I thought maybe we could just sit here and not talk and... eat fried chicken and wait for the talking place to come.
He not only cooks the soup and my fried chicken and lets anybody onto my property that he wants me to!
